verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al came up מַלְאַךְ־ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'ach- And an angel יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal from Gilgal אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַבֹּכִ֑ים <S%H1066><s%> hab-bo-Chim; to Bochim פ Peh וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer and said אַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-'a-Leh I made you to go up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt וָאָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> va-'a-Vi and have brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, you unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti which I sware לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-Vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers וָאֹמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar and I said לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אָפֵ֧ר <S%H6565><s%> 'a-Fer break בְּרִיתִ֛י <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam.
